name: CHI Ceramic Triple Waver Iron, Curling Iron Creates Long-Lasting Frizz-Free, Waves & Curls for All Hair Types
short_description: CREATE BEACHY WAVES: The CHI Ceramic Triple Waver creates luxurious waves and curls, reduces frizz & static, while adding unparalleled shine. Features multiple heat settings, quick heat up, and a 6.5 ft swivel cord for ease of styling.

CHI'S TOURMALINE LINE: Innovative Tourmaline Ceramic technology delivers even heat distribution, producing negative ions and far-infrared, which reduce static electricity for that perfect style. Leaves hair smooth, silky, & with an exceptional shine.

CHI CURLING IRONS & WANDS: CHI's curling irons & wands are designed to create curls & waves with titanium-infused ceramic plate technology. Digital temperature control for quick set up, non-stick styling surface for hair body, & non-slip handles.
HOW TO USE: Select desired barrel height according to desired look. Take a 1.5” section of hair and place in the waver. Close the plates and hold down for 3 to 5 seconds according to your hair type.

CHI: Founded by Farouk Shami, a hairdresser allergic to ammonia who sought to create the first ammonia-free hair color & has remained committed to crafting the finest ethical haircare. All CHI products are cruelty-free, paraben-free, & sulfate-free.
product_description: CHI Tourmaline Ceramic Curling Iron utilizies the latest innovation technology combining Tourmaline Ceramic with even heat distribution, producing an exceptionally high amount of negative ions and Far Infrared which reduce static electricity for your perfect style. Hair is left smooth and silky with an unparralleled shine. The nonstick ceramic surface glides through the hair while creating luxrious waves and curls that last all day.
